item.title: Zeebro – Classic Sack – Cotton canvas Bean bag
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: Zig zag zebra design printed cotton canvas in tear drop shape Fabric: Cotton canvas Safe velcro with zipper Machine washable fabric ( after removing beans from it) Fabric warranty _
item.content:encoded:
• Zig zag zebra design printed cotton canvas in tear drop shape
  • Fabric: Cotton canvas
  • Safe velcro with zipper
  • Machine washable fabric ( after removing beans from it)
  • Fabric warranty _ Artificial leather : 24 months
  • Classic sack model or traditionally known as teardrop shape beanbag is the most popular and common design in bean bag category. Its sack shape gives multiple ways to sit on it. This bean bag can be used for sitting, laid back positions based on your purpose.
Material Cotton canvas
Size Kids (XL), Teen (XXL), Adult (XXXL), Jumbo, King
Dimensions XL : 70cm (L) x 70cm(B) x 70cm(H)

XXL : 77cm (L) x 77cm(B) x 78cm(H)

XXXL : 85cm (L) x 85cm(B) x 85cm(H)

JUMBO : 90cm (L) x 90cm(B) x 95cm(H)

KING : 100cm (L) x 100cm(B) x 105cm(H)
